Index >  Capability

Capability

Description

specifies the capabiltiy to be negotiated with the Data Source.

Data type

EnumDWT_Cap (int)

Syntax

.Capability = EnumDWT_Cap.ICAP_PIXELTYPE;

Remarks

Prior to negotiating capability, OpenSource() needs to be called to make Dynamic Web TWAIN ready for capability negotiation.

When an error occurs, check ErrorCode orErrorStringfor error information.
